document_data.name: Turnback Amulet
document_data.mainbody: A '''''turnback amulet''''' was an [[elven]] amulet that turned [[spell]]s back upon their caster.
document_data.Powers: Per [[Symrustar Auglamyr]], a ''turnback amulet'' could turn spells back upon their caster, but needed to draw blood to function.
document_data.History: The guards of house [[Auglamyr]] in [[Cormanthor]] were given ''turnback amulets'' as of the mid-3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
